name: screenplay-project-tools
description: Global toolset for screenplay projects - Fountain PDF generation, analysis, and research tools

notes.fountain-to-pdf: Use screenplain (Python): pip install screenplain, then: screenplain script.fountain --pdf output.pdf
notes.better-fountain: Or use Better Fountain VS Code extension: Command Palette > Fountain: Export to PDF
notes.wrap-tool: Alternative: wrap (see github.com/Wraparound/wrap) - cross-platform Fountain to PDF

author: Kevin Samy
